analysis.key_quote: This is a terrible Proposed Rule.  Almost 150 years ago, the Federal government created a civil service system based on merit, not on the spoils system that had been in effect almost since the founding of the Republic.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a merit-based civil service system and expressing concerns about politicization and loyalty to a partisan agenda, particularly in relation to Donald Trump.
